Detailed Description

Class representing an animated texture.

Stored as a list of frames with associated timing.

DX::BaseTexture * Moo::AnimatingTexture::pTexture (  )  [virtual]

Returns a pointer to texture referenced by the current animFrame_.

Updates animFrame_ the first time the function gets called in a frame.

Returns:
pointer to the current texture.
